subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Art Official has been listed as the 9-5 favorite for Monday’s $392,850 Cane Pace, the first leg of the pacing Triple Crown for 3-year-olds. Art Official paced a record-setting mile in 1 minute 50 4/5 seconds, breaking the track record at Freehold Raceway in last week’s elimination races. It was also more than 2 seconds faster than the 1:53 clocking of Badlands Nitro, the other elimination winner. The top four finishers in each elimination advanced to the Cane final. Ron Pierce will drive Art Official, who will start from post No. 7. After the Cane moves on to the Little Brown Jug at the Delaware, Ohio, Fairgrounds on Sept. 18 and concludes with the Messenger Stakes at Yonkers Raceway on Oct. 25.
